Summary: Odd Aeriel activites above misille site
trends: There have been no other sightings in Harlowton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details There isa book CLEAR INTENT that details a Ufosighting in the 70s at the exact same area. Having read this book, I wasastounded to see something really strange in the exact area last week whiletraveling thru on the 22 and 24 of July. I know this is absurd but this areahas really clear skis and the Missile sites are in clear view- I could see whatappeared to be a Hellicopter flying oddly travelling north on highway 191outside of Harlowtown on the 22nd. On the 24th travelling into Harlowtown onHighway 12 (east) I saw the exact same thing at about the same time!
